SA10n1063:3: iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya |
SA10n1063:4: upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ ,
SA10n1063:9: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt,
SA10n1063:12: atha syāt - naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo'sti yato'sya vidyamānatvādutpatti vaiyarthyaṃ syāt,
SA10n1063:13: kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti |
SA10n1063:16: atha syāt - iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,
SA10n1063:17: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti ,
SA10n1063:19: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham |
SA10n1063:21: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ,
SA10n1063:23: sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10n1063:27: sa hi teṣāṃ padārthāntaraḥ saṃparkājanitatvātsvabhāva ityucyate |
SA10n1063:28: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ - yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt ,
SA10n1063:34: nanu ca gppālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti |
SA10n1063:36: etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ - nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt |
SA10n1063:37: avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ |
SA10n1063:38: yathā hi taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
SA10n1063:39: evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam |
SA10n1063:41: bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam |
SA10n1063:44: tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ,
SA10n1063:49: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ |
SA10n1063:52: svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ ||
SA10n1063:54: atrāha - yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate,
SA10n1063:55: kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam | ucyate -
SA10n1063:56: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca ||2 ||
SA10n1063:57: iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate |
SA10n1063:59: yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam |
SA10n1063:60: yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ,
SA10n1063:62: yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram |
SA10n1063:63: yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam,
SA10n1063:64: ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate |
SA10n1063:68: yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā,
SA10n1063:71: na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ |
SA10n1063:73: tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ |
SA10n1063:75: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā |
SA10n1063:79: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate ||
SA10n1063:95: etaduktaṃ bhavati - avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti,
SA10n1063:98: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca |
SA10n1063:100: sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam |
SA10n1063:109: tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo'pi bhaviṣyati |
SA10n1063:113: iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate |
SA10n1063:116: yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti,
SA10n1063:122: sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet,
SA10n1063:126: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati ||4 ||
SA10n1063:127: bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet,
SA10n1063:142: iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat,
SA10n1063:144: ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke |
SA10n1063:148: tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam -
SA10n1063:149: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca |
SA10n1063:150: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane ||6 ||
SA10n1063:159: vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti,
SA10n1063:161: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti |
SA10n1063:165: ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ,
SA10n1063:167: ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt,
SA10n1063:169: āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
SA10n1063:177: yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca |
SA10n1063:190: tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham,
SA10n1063:197: iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti ||
SA10n1063:207: atrāha - yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt,
SA10n1063:211: api ca | yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10n1063:212: tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha -
SA10n1063:215: tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt | yasmāt -
SA10n1063:221: evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt |
SA10n1063:224: atrāha - yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate,
SA10n1063:227: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10n1063:232: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi -
SA10n1063:234: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA10n1063:235: tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva |
SA10n1063:240: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati,
SA10n1063:247: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam |
SA10n1063:252: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate |
SA10n1063:256: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam,
SA10n1063:259: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate,
SA10n1063:262: sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt |
SA10n1063:263: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ - na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti |
SA10n1063:266: yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti,
SA10n1063:271: tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto'ntadvayaparihāraḥ?
SA10n1063:281: tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ sāṃmitīyapudgalavādavat,
SA10n1063:289: bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi |
SA10n1063:317: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
SA10n1063:321: na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
SA10n1063:326: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ | ityādi |
